title: Idle Hands
description: An application aimed at those within the underworld of society who possess a certain set of skills, where the user can advertise their skills for "Hire" or locate and connect with any type of lackey they require

title: Racetrack Book-A-Thon
description: Make searching and connecting with racetrack bookies easy with our simple Racetrack bookies application. At the click of a button search race events near you.

title: Bottle Clink
description: Online e-commerce application to search, purchase and deliver your favourite spirit products straight to your door with Bottle Clink.

title: Saffires
description: A Gem super site for all exquisite Gem business, Purchase, Sell and Trade and discuss all things related to Gems

title: Faberge Antiques
description: A specialised application for all things Antiques, Art and History. This E-commerce enables users to connect with buyers and sellers of these specialised antiques and art pieces. Users are able to take part or host auctions or other methods trade to transact over the app.

title: New World Exports
description: An application that utilises NFT's verification in the exporting of Engineering and automobiles and other expensive products
